de: Organic production of aromatic and medicinal plants, artisanal transformation into essential oils and floral waters. Exploitation of an olive grove in Nyons for olive oil. Mail order sales. Sale at the farm and visits by appointment.
ru: Organic production of aromatic and medicinal plants, artisanal transformation into essential oils and floral waters. Exploitation of an olive grove in Nyons for olive oil. Mail order sales. Sale at the farm and visits by appointment.
en: Organic production of aromatic and medicinal plants, artisanal transformation into essential oils and floral waters. Exploitation of an olive grove in Nyons for olive oil. Mail order sales. Sale at the farm and visits by appointment.
it: Organic production of aromatic and medicinal plants, artisanal transformation into essential oils and floral waters. Exploitation of an olive grove in Nyons for olive oil. Mail order sales. Sale at the farm and visits by appointment.
fr: Vente d'huiles essentielles, hydrolats et huile d'olive
zh: Organic production of aromatic and medicinal plants, artisanal transformation into essential oils and floral waters. Exploitation of an olive grove in Nyons for olive oil. Mail order sales. Sale at the farm and visits by appointment.
es: Organic production of aromatic and medicinal plants, artisanal transformation into essential oils and floral waters. Exploitation of an olive grove in Nyons for olive oil. Mail order sales. Sale at the farm and visits by appointment.
nl: Biologische productie van aromatische en medicinale planten, ambachtelijke omzetting in etherische oliën en bloemenwater. Exploitatie van een olijfgaard in Nyons voor olijfolie. Postorderverkoop. Verkoop op de boerderij en bezoeken op afspraak.

de: Max. 10 Personen pro Besuch, hydroalkoholisches Gel und Desinfektionsmittel stehen zur Verfügung. Das Tragen einer Maske wird bevorzugt.
en: Max 10 people per visit, hydroalcoholic gel and disinfectant available. It is preferable to wear a mask.
it: Massimo 10 persone per visita, gel idroalcolico e disinfettante a disposizione. È preferibile indossare una maschera.
fr: Max 10 personnes par visite, gel hydroalcoolique et désinfectant à disposition. Le port du masque est préférable.
nl: Max 10 personen per bezoek, hydroalcoholische gel en ontsmettingsmiddel beschikbaar. Het is beter om een masker te dragen.
es: Máximo 10 personas por visita, gel hidroalcohólico y desinfectante disponibles. Es preferible llevar una máscara.
